rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0001
rows.name:
Nanakoori...
We've arrived!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0002
rows.name:
This is the view you wanted to see,
isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0003
rows.name: We've arrived~!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0004
rows.name:
This is the spot Nanakoori
mentioned, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0005
rows.name:
So this is the locatio
 Nanakoori described.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0006
rows.name:
You wanted to see the view
from here, correct?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0007
rows.name:
So this is where Nanakoori
wanted to visit, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0008
rows.name:
So ya wanted to check out
the view from here?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0009
rows.name: Yes...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0012
rows.name:
The scenery is lovely, but...What was
Nanakoori specifically looking for?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0013
rows.name: ...Um, that over there.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0014
rows.name: That red tree over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0015
rows.name: ...Yes, that's the Saffronia tree.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0016
rows.name:
...There's a children's song
about the Saffronia tree.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0017
rows.name: ...I really like that song.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0018
rows.name: Huh, a children's song.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0019
rows.name:
You're pretty sensitive to
music, aren't you, Nanakoori.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0020
rows.name: I see~

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0021
rows.name:
I see Nanakoori has an
appreciation for music.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0022
rows.name: A children's song...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0023
rows.name: You're very attuned to music, Nanakoori.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0024
rows.name: Hmm, a children's song, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0025
rows.name:
So ya got a thing for music,
don'tcha Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0026
rows.name: ...Yes.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0027
rows.name: Well... I enjoy it...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0028
rows.name: But we've never heard you sing before.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0029
rows.name: Are you only interested in listening?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0030
rows.name: I... I do like singing, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0031
rows.name:
I'm... not good with...
performing in front of others...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0032
rows.name:
Indeed, Nanakoori is an extremely
shy person.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0033
rows.name: ...I'm sorry.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0034
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0035
rows.name:
Does Nanakoori find me
difficult to deal with too?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0036
rows.name:
Do you also play musical instruments,
Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0037
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0038
rows.name:
Does Nanakoori find me difficult
to deal with too?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0039
rows.name:
Do you play any instruments as well,
Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0040
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0041
rows.name:
Am I also someone you're
uncomfortable with, Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0042
rows.name:
Do you also play musical instruments,
Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0043
rows.name: What should I say...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0044
rows.name:
Ya don't feel uncomfortable
'round me too, do ya Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0045
rows.name:
Can ya play any
instruments as well, Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0101
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0102
rows.name:
That's quite a bold, almost reckless
question! Even Tora is a bit shocked!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0103
rows.name: ...Right?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0104
rows.name: What's your honest opinion, Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0105
rows.name: Erm...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0109
rows.name:
I don't dislike you...
but...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0110
rows.name:
...I have trouble feeling at ease.
...I apologize.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0111
rows.name:
Nanakoori,
you shouldn't worry about it so much.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0112
rows.name:
When Tora first met Boss and everyone,
I was too nervous to speak much
and had trouble making friends.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0113
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I don't remember it being like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0114
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Is that really what happened...?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0115
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]That's surprising...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0116
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Really...?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0117
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]Oh, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0118
rows.name:
I too...
even if it's little by little...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0119
rows.name:
I want to be able to get along well
and have fun with everyone...
...that's what I think.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0120
rows.name:
With that attitude,
you'll be okay.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0121
rows.name: Let's take it slow and steady, alright?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0122
rows.name: With that mindset, you'll be just fine!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0123
rows.name:
Let's take things at a measured pace,
slow but sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0124
rows.name:
With that attitude,
you shouldn't have any issues.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0125
rows.name:
Just take your time and move forward
at your own pace.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0126
rows.name:
With that mindset,
everything'll work out fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0127
rows.name:
No need to rush or get anxious,
just take it easy and you'll be fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0128
rows.name: ...Okay!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0201
rows.name:
Tora bet Nanakoori can play every
instrument!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0202
rows.name:
...I'm not very good, but
...I can play a few.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0203
rows.name:
Amazing!
What are you good at?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0204
rows.name:
Organ... I think?
I also like the lute... but

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0205
rows.name: Tora is skilled with the recorder!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0206
rows.name:
All Nopon children receive
intensive training
before they reach 5 years old!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0207
rows.name: ...I'd like to hear it.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0208
rows.name:
Tora will perform together
with Nanakoori next time!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0209
rows.name: ...That sounds fun.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0210
rows.name:
By the way, Hana
is good at playing the trumpet.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0211
rows.name:
Can play continuously
without taking breaths.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0212
rows.name: That's amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0213
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]It seems like they've
totally forgotten about me...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0214
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]But Nanakoori seems to be having fun,
so it's okay.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0215
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I hope someday she can
get along with everyone like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0216
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Haven't they forgotten that I'm here?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0217
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]But Nanakoori
seems to be having fun, so it's fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0218
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I hope someday she can talk about music
while getting along with everyone...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0219
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]It appears I've faded
into the background...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0220
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]However, Nanakoori is
conversing so joyfully,
I shouldn't disrupt her.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0221
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I hope eventually she'll be comfortable
enough to enthusiastically discuss
music with the group...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0222
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Helloooo, did ya forget I'm here or what?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0223
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Oh well, Nanakoori
seems to be enjoying herself,
so it's fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0224
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I hope someday she can
get along with everyone like that...
